<bugfix id="bugfix1" codedby="Luke1410" sourceforgeid="1238391" timestamp="2005-08-05 01:10"
changed the line: "elseif (parentRect.r + width < sWidth * 0.8) then" to "elseif (parentRect.r + width > sWidth * 0.8) then" as suggested by the sourceforgeuser (see sourceforgeid).
the tooltip could swap over the right side of the window
Added a new optional parameter to TT_GetTextGSC, to allow the exact amount being print to the tooltip. If the second parameter is set to true, the amount of copper will also be printed out, even if the given money value is > 1g. That functionality was needed to print the correct suggested price to the tooltip.
